channel.title: 2 questions- rights 3 crown and chaging starting bank
channel.description:
I have two fairly simple questions.
1 is on my server, when your rights are 3, you can't see the crown. How do I change that?
2 is how do you change a players starting bank?

item.title: 2 questions- rights 3 crown and chaging starting bank
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres the code,look for this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

and you should see something like this

if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);		// "This world is full."

highlight all of it down to

catch(java.lang.Exception __ex) {

and paste this in over it

			if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);		// "This world is full."
			else out.write(returnCode);				// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)
			if (playerRights == 3) {
			out.write(2);      //Crown fixup
			} else {
			out.write(playerRights);		// mod level
			}
			out.write(0);					// no logg

		}
		}

Read full topic
item.source: 2 questions- rights 3 crown and chaging starting bank

item.title: 2 questions- rights 3 crown and chaging starting bank
item.dc:creator: @kingduffy kingduffy
item.description:
@kingduffy wrote:

If your player rights are 3 and you cannot see the crown then you cannot change that. Just put your playerights as 2?
if u do this u wont have owner rights u have admin rights... wt u do is: give u rights - 3 then go to data click admins type ur username in administators file and ur done.

Read full topic
